About Us

Doggo and Catto Cafe serves cat-puccinos, cat-themed treats and crafty meowchandise, all in the company of feline friends.

Doggo and Catto Cafe is Vancouver Island’s first and only cat cafe, bordering Courtenay and the Comox Valley on the second floor of the International Village Mall near Driftwood. Enjoy cat-themed beverages and snacks, shop for fun meowchandise in our gift shop online or in store, and most importantly, bask in the company of the 8 to 12 cats we have in our cafe!

Partnered with the BC SPCA to host an ever-changing roster of adoptable felines, Doggo and Catto Cafe provides a foster environment for the cats until they find their forever homes, as well as a community gathering space for cat lovers of Vancouver Island in need of some quality kitty time. Catfe has found homes for over 550 cats since opening in December 2015.

It is an amazing place to relax, enjoy a cup of coffee and socialize with the cats. Nowadays in our fast busy lifestyles experience something different. Make a reservation today and experience the goodness that Doggo and Catto Café offer in the heart of Courtenay, B.C, and Canada.

Upon creating Doggo & Catto café, we're taking our motto of creating a friendly atmosphere where our cats come first, to the North at our Brand New Cat Village North branch in Courtenay, British Columbia. What we created and still are creating is a beautiful home away from home for our customers where they can relax in a vibrant space filled with our little furry friends. Whether you're looking to come here and have fun, meet friends or de-stress, escape into a world full of funny, fluffy and cuddly kitties!

Meet the owners and founders of Doggo & Catto Coffee Today!
